objects.description: After security appliances blocked one version of the ADVSTORESHELL implant, APT28 actors compiled and delivered another ADVSTORESHELL x64 backdoor.APT28 also used a first-stage downloader to contact the C2 server to obtain the second-stage implant.

external_references.description: Bitdefender. (2015, December). APT28 Under the Scope. Retrieved February 23, 2017.
Kaspersky Lab's Global Research and Analysis Team. (2015, December 4). Sofacy APT hits high profile targets with updated toolset. Retrieved December 10, 2015.
